foreignData.name: Gratwanderer
foreignData.text: Klerikerzauber, die du spielst, kosten beim Ausspielen {W}{B} weniger. Dieser Effekt reduziert nur die Menge an farbigem Mana, das du bezahlst. (Spielst du zum Beispiel einen Kleriker mit Manakosten von {1}{W}, kostet er nur {1} beim Ausspielen.)

foreignData.name: Andaborde
foreignData.text: Te cuesta {W}{B} menos jugar los hechizos de Clérigo. Este efecto sólo reduce la cantidad de maná de color que pagas. (Por ejemplo, si juegas un Clérigo con coste de maná {1}{W}, te cuesta {1} jugarlo.)

foreignData.name: Marcheur des marges
foreignData.text: Les sorts de clerc que vous jouez coûtent {W}{B} de moins à jouer. Cet effet réduit seulement la quantité de mana coloré que vous payez. (Par exemple, si vous jouez un clerc avec un coût de mana de {1}{W}, il coûte {1} à jouer.)

foreignData.name: Calcalimiti
foreignData.text: Le magie Chierico che giochi costano {W}{B} in meno per essere giocate. Questo effetto riduce solo l'ammontare di mana colorato da pagare (per esempio, se giochi un Chierico con un costo di mana pari a {1}{W}, costa {1} per essere giocato).

foreignData.name: Caminhante do Gume
foreignData.text: Suas mágicas de Clérigo custam {W}{B} a menos para serem jogadas. Este efeito reduz apenas a quantidade de mana colorida que você paga. (Por exemplo, se você baixar um Clérigo com custo de mana igual a {1}{W}, ele custará {1} para ser jogado.)

name: Edgewalker
originalText: Cleric spells you play cost {W}{B} less to play. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you play a Cleric with mana cost {1}{W}, it costs {1} to play.)

rulings.text: If you have more than one of these on the battlefield, the cost reduction is cumulative.
You apply cost reduction effects after other cost modifiers, so it can reduce additional costs or alternative costs if they include {W} and/or {B}.

If a spell has hybrid mana symbols in its mana cost, you choose which half you will be paying before determining the total cost. If you choose to pay such a cost with {W} or {B}, Edgewalker can reduce that part of the cost.

text: Cleric spells you cast cost {W}{B} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you cast a Cleric spell with mana cost {1}{W}, it costs {1} to cast.)
